title: Regulation (EEC) No 1010/73 of the Commission of 13 April 1973 defining the administrative costs of recognized groups of hop producers
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 1010/73 OF THE COMMISSION  of 13 April 1973  defining the administrative costs of recognized groups of hop producers
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 April 1973.
For the Commission
